description: Decimal expansion of Rényi's parking constant.
references: A. Rényi, On a one-dimensional problem concerning random space-filling, Publ. Math. Inst. Hung. Acad. Sci. 3 (1958), pp. 109-127.
links: Simon Plouffe, The Parking or Renyi constant
Simon Plouffe, The Parking or Renyi constant
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Rényi's Parking Constants
mathematica: rd[k_] := rd[k] = RealDigits[ NIntegrate[E^(-2*(Gamma[0, x] + Log[x] + EulerGamma)), {x, 0, 2^k}, WorkingPrecision -> 105] + 1/(2^k*E^(2*EulerGamma))][[1]]; rd[k = 10]; While[rd[k] != rd[k - 1], k++]; rd[k] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 05 2012, after _Eric W. Weisstein_ *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
